headline: Assessing Williams-Sonoma (WSM) Valuation After a Recent Share Price Rebound
summary: Williams-Sonoma (WSM) has been quietly treading water this month, but its longer history tells a different story, with the stock roughly tripling over the past 3 years despite recent softness. See our latest analysis for Williams-Sonoma. At around $189 a share, Williams-Sonoma has seen a sharp 7 day share price return of just over 7 percent, even as its year to date share price return has been more muted, while the 3 year total shareholder return still reflects powerful long term momentum. If...
